articles.title: Emotional Russell Crowe weeps over the death of his puppy Louis after he was hit by a truck - Daily Mail
articles.description: Russell Crowe struggled to hold back tears on Friday morning as he spoke out about the tragic death of his puppy Louis.
articles.content:
Russell Crowe broke down in tears on Friday morning as he spoke out about the tragic death of his puppy Louis.
The Gladiator star, 58, announced on Thursday his beloved pooch had died at just 16 mon… [+3407 chars]

articles.author: Emily Stearn
articles.title: I'm a podiatrist - here's what your feet say about your health - Daily Mail
articles.description: From pesky cracked heels to more serious problems, such as swelling, feet often show signs of disease before any other part of your body, says Emma McConnachie, a podiatrist in Falkirk, Scotland.
articles.content:
You might not think it but your feet can tell you a surprising amount about your health.
From pesky cracked heels and calluses to more serious problems, such as swelling, they often show signs of di… [+9304 chars]
